body:
So they managed to reprogram an invention of lala, with it's own exclusive SO, without erasing its previous AI and personality.
Without previous knowledge of said SO. Without compatible external hardware to reprogram it.
Not only that, but to reprogram it to capture its master (and surely Lala got SOME precaution or an hardware way stop it in case such event created if for not any reason during the creation phase in case of accident).
All of this in a few minutes.
Sure, and the sky is green, the leaf blue and the bu||sh*t is tasty.
Go home loser. This is no better than old sun overcooked BS.
